column5: Finally, six of you can luxuriate in the thick of it all. Entertain endlessly. Cook in custom kitchen. Sip coffee on tree-shaded patio. Swim in tranquil, heated pool. Sleep peacefully in plush beds. Walk to parks and tennis. Enjoy the Park Cities Christmas lights. Shop to your heart's content. Get around Dallas almost effortlessly.
column8: A Park Cities Retreat - Just Blocks from SMU
